City Storm Map
--------------



Monday - Thursday: 7:30 am - 4:30 pm

Fridays: 8:00 am - 4:00 pm

Closed Saturday & Sunday

![Oak-Ridge-North_Ai_CC_rgb_White.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5afa0d_ea441e821a4f44de9e1f8ae029645254~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_321,h_136,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Oak-Ridge-North_Ai_CC_rgb_White.png)

CONTACT CITY HALL & MUNICIPAL COURT

27424 Robinson Road

Main Line: 281-292-4648
Municipal Court: 281-292-8736
Municipal Court Fax: 281-364-7168

CONTACT POLICE & PUBLIC WORKS

27375 Spectrum Drive

Main Line: 281-292-4648
Police (non-emergency): 281-292-4643
Police (24-hour dispatch): 936-538-5900
Public Works (after hours): 281-939-3341
